Spring.Utils.IO Classes

Classes
 NameDescription
TDroppedFilesEnumerable

Enumerates the file system entries of dropped files that result from a successful drag-and-drop operation.

TFileEnumerable

Represents type TFileEnumerable.

TFileEnumerator

Represents type TFileEnumerator.

TFileEnumeratorBase

Represents type TFileEnumeratorBase.

TFileListEnumerable

Enumerates the file system entries that come from a string list.

TFileListEnumerator

Represents type TFileListEnumerator.

TFileSearcher

Searches the directories, files or file sytem entries in several locations.

TFileSearcherBase

Provides an abstract implementation of file searcher.

TFileSearchStatistics

Records the statistics information of a file searcher.

TFileSearchWorker

Represents a background file searching thread which walk through all entries that come from an enumerable collection of file system entries.

TSearchPatternMatcher

Determines if a filename matches a search pattern.
